attributes.action: Landlords to reduce rents by 25% in line with goverment austerity cuts
attributes.additional_details:
Cut all rents by landlords  by at least 25% in line with goverment interest rates for home buyers.
Ban increases of rents untill government reaches austerity tatgets.
Bring landlords into the economy of GB  and  get GB back on track.
Landlords to be included in austerity cuts.
